In this one, we allocate a single array to store the hash, but we zero it out using memset every single time.

Why is the hash different across runs?

```bash
for i in {1..5}; do echo "run $i"; ./run.sh; echo; done;
```

Output:
```
run 1
+ clang -g3 -o a.out main.c sha-256.c
+ ./a.out
```
